item.title: Hugo Post
item.description: The current setup is created following the instructions in this video. A quick summmary of the steps required to create a new post for this blog. Create a new post using hugo new posts/<post_name>.md and update it. Run hugo server to check the contents locally. Run hugo -t hugo-paper to generate the static page in public directory. Go to public directory and push the changes.

item.title: Second
item.description: Hugo is simple It is quite simple to create posts in Hugo and deploy on Github Pages.

item.title: Hello
